channel.title: GRICAD - Nova on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: [Resolved] GRICAD Nova power cut
item.description: Description - The building where the Nova platform is hosted is currently undergoing an electric cut due to the section of a cable in a nearby street.
item.content: Description - The building where the Nova platform is hosted is currently undergoing an electric cut due to the section of a cable in a nearby street.
